learning.unsupervised.refinement

Class PantSAStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.refinement.PantSAStar

  • public class PantSAStar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an algorithm described in the paper: Diego Ingaramo, Marcelo Errecalde and Paolo Rosso. "A general bio-inspired method to improve the short-text clustering task" which was presented at the 2010 CICLING conference.

        Parameters:
        numClusters - Number of clusters.
        clusterAssociations - Array that contains cluster associations for data points.
        silhouetteArray - Array containing Silhouette index values for data points.
        dset - DataSet object.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object.

      • refine

        public int[] refine()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs cluster configuration refinement according to the PantSAStar algorithm.
        Returns:
        An integer array containing the refined cluster associations.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNumChanges

        public int getNumChanges()
        Returns:
        Integer that is the number of changes made by the refinement.

      • getProportionOfChanges

        public double getProportionOfChanges()
        Returns:
        Double that is the relative proportion of changes to the original data size.
